title: Pro.Cycling.Manager.2014-CPY
description:
U PRESENTS U

Release Name....... Pro.Cycling.Manager.2014-CPY
Release Date....... 26/07/2014
Shop Release Date.. 19/06/2014
Format............. Iso
Release............ Game
Kind............... Simulation
Protection......... StarForce 5.70.51.0
Files N............ 90x100MB

U INFORMATION U

Behind every great Team is a great Manager Take on the role of
manager and lead one of the pro cycling circuit's 75 teams. Join
an outstanding 2014 season with more than 200 competitions across
550 stages including the prestigious Tour de France. Manage your
pro team and plan your season, including recruitment, contracts,
sponsorship and training Choose the best strategy to win during
races. Enhanced graphics, new management features out of the race
(equipment R&D, financial management and improved relationships
with sponsors), realistic injuries system, a dynamic transfer mar
ket, a whole new intuitive interface and richer racing gameplay
(consecutive orders, race tactics) are on the menu of this ultra
complete 2014 edition
In solo, or in multiplayer played with managers around the world,
Pro Cycling Manager will delight all cycling and sports simulations
lovers.

Instructions

-Burn or mount the image
-Install the game
-Run the keygen from the Crack dir
-Copy the Serial Number from the keygen to the activation window and
click on perform activation by "other" means
-Copy the Hardware Code from the activation window to the keygen and
click on "Generate
-Copy the Activation Key from the keygen to the activation window and
click on "Next
-Install the patch "Setup-Patch-1.3.0.0-From-1.0.0.0.exe" from the
Update dir (optional
-Use the Serial Number to create a new profile in the game
-Enjoy

Languages: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish

U GROUP  U

Established in 1999, we are possibly the oldest Italian-based
release group still in activity.  We express a big THANK YOU to
all those friends who helped us in various forms throughout these
years  Don't forget to support the companies and to keep the
Scene about FUN.

Fondato nel 1999, CPY e' probabilmente il piu' vecchio gruppo
release in Italia ancora in attivita'.  Ringraziamo DI CUORE tutti
gli amici che ci hanno aiutati in ogni maniera in questi anni
Ricordate di supportare le compagnie cinematografiche e di
software, e che la Scena dev'essere basata sul DIVERTIMENTO.

Contact: cpyhushmail.com

UU
